verses.plain: Let God arise, let his enemies be scattered: let them also that hate him flee before him.

tokens.t: Let God arise, let his enemies be scattered: let them also that hate him flee before him.

verses.plain: As smoke is driven away, so drive them away: as wax melteth before the fire, so let the wicked perish at the presence of God.

tokens.t: As smoke is driven away,
drive
away: as wax melteth before the fire,
let the wicked perish at the presence of God.

verses.plain: But let the righteous be glad; let them rejoice before God: yea, let them exceedingly rejoice.

tokens.t: But let the righteous be glad; let them rejoice before God: yea, let them exceedingly rejoice.

verses.plain: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name Jah, and rejoice before him.

tokens.t: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name
, and rejoice before him.

verses.plain: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.

tokens.t: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows,
God in his holy habitation.

verses.plain: God setteth the solitary in families: he bringeth out those which are bound with chains: but the rebellious dwell in a dry land.

tokens.t: God setteth the solitary in families: he bringeth out those which are bound with chains: but the rebellious dwell in a dry

verses.plain: O God, when thou wentest forth before thy people, when thou didst march through the wilderness; Selah:

tokens.t: O God, when thou wentest forth before thy people, when thou didst march through the wilderness; Selah:

verses.plain: The earth shook, the heavens also dropped at the presence of God: even Sinai itself was moved at the presence of God, the God of Israel.

tokens.t: The earth shook, the heavens also dropped at the presence of God:
Sinai itself
at the presence of God, the God of Israel.

verses.plain: Thou, O God, didst send a plentiful rain, whereby thou didst confirm thine inheritance, when it was weary.

tokens.t: Thou, O God, didst send a plentiful rain, whereby thou didst confirm thine inheritance, when it was weary.

verses.plain: Thy congregation hath dwelt therein: thou, O God, hast prepared of thy goodness for the poor.

tokens.t: Thy congregation hath dwelt therein: thou, O God, hast prepared of thy goodness for the poor.

verses.plain: The Lord gave the word: great was the company of those that published it.

tokens.t: The Lord gave the word: great
the company of those that published

verses.plain: Kings of armies did flee apace: and she that tarried at home divided the spoil.

tokens.t: Kings of armies did flee apace: and she that tarried at home divided the spoil.

verses.plain: Though ye have lien among the pots, yet shall ye be as the wings of a dove covered with silver, and her feathers with yellow gold.

tokens.t: Though ye have lien among the pots,
the wings of a dove covered with silver, and her feathers with yellow gold.

verses.plain: When the Almighty scattered kings in it, it was white as snow in Salmon.

tokens.t: When the Almighty scattered kings in it, it was
as snow in Salmon.

verses.plain: The hill of God is as the hill of Bashan; an high hill as the hill of Bashan.

tokens.t: The hill of God
the hill of Bashan; an high hill
the hill of Bashan.

verses.plain: Why leap ye, ye high hills? this is the hill which God desireth to dwell in; yea, the LORD will dwell in it for ever.

tokens.t: Why leap ye, ye high hills?
the hill
God desireth to dwell in; yea, the
will dwell
for ever.

verses.plain: The chariots of God are twenty thousand, even thousands of angels: the Lord is among them, as in Sinai, in the holy place.

tokens.t: The chariots of God
twenty thousand,
thousands of angels: the Lord
among them,
Sinai, in the holy

verses.plain: Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea, for the rebellious also, that the LORD God might dwell among them.

tokens.t: Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea,
the rebellious also, that the
God might dwell

verses.plain: Blessed be the Lord, who daily loadeth us with benefits, even the God of our salvation. Selah.

tokens.t: Blessed
the Lord,
daily loadeth us
the God of our salvation. Selah.

verses.plain: He that is our God is the God of salvation; and unto GOD the Lord belong the issues from death.

tokens.t: our God
the God of salvation; and unto
the Lord
the issues from death.

verses.plain: But God shall wound the head of his enemies, and the hairy scalp of such an one as goeth on still in his trespasses.

tokens.t: But God shall wound the head of his enemies,
the hairy scalp of such an one as goeth on still in his trespasses.

verses.plain: The Lord said, I will bring again from Bashan, I will bring my people again from the depths of the sea:

tokens.t: The Lord said, I will bring again from Bashan, I will bring
again from the depths of the sea:

verses.plain: That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of thine enemies, and the tongue of thy dogs in the same.

tokens.t: That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of
enemies,
the tongue of thy dogs in the same.

verses.plain: They have seen thy goings, O God; even the goings of my God, my King, in the sanctuary.

tokens.t: They have seen thy goings, O God;
the goings of my God, my King, in the sanctuary.

verses.plain: The singers went before, the players on instruments followed after; among them were the damsels playing with timbrels.

tokens.t: The singers went before, the players on instruments
after; among
the damsels playing with timbrels.

verses.plain: Bless ye God in the congregations, even the Lord, from the fountain of Israel.

tokens.t: Bless ye God in the congregations,
the Lord, from the fountain of Israel.

verses.plain: There is little Benjamin with their ruler, the princes of Judah and their council, the princes of Zebulun, and the princes of Naphtali.

tokens.t: There
little Benjamin
their ruler, the princes of Judah
their council, the princes of Zebulun,
the princes of Naphtali.

verses.plain: Thy God hath commanded thy strength: strengthen, O God, that which thou hast wrought for us.

tokens.t: Thy God hath commanded thy strength: strengthen, O God, that which thou hast wrought for us.

verses.plain: Because of thy temple at Jerusalem shall kings bring presents unto thee.

tokens.t: Because of thy temple at Jerusalem shall kings bring presents unto thee.

verses.plain: Rebuke the company of spearmen, the multitude of the bulls, with the calves of the people, till every one submit himself with pieces of silver: scatter thou the people that delight in war.

tokens.t: Rebuke the company of spearmen, the multitude of the bulls, with the calves of the people,
submit himself with pieces of silver: scatter thou the people
delight in war.

verses.plain: Princes shall come out of Egypt; Ethiopia shall soon stretch out her hands unto God.

tokens.t: Princes shall come out of Egypt; Ethiopia shall soon stretch out her hands unto God.

verses.plain: Sing unto God, ye kingdoms of the earth; O sing praises unto the Lord; Selah:

tokens.t: Sing unto God, ye kingdoms of the earth; O sing praises unto the Lord; Selah:

verses.plain: To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens, which were of old; lo, he doth send out his voice, and that a mighty voice.

tokens.t: To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens,
of old; lo, he doth send out his voice,
a mighty voice.

verses.plain: Ascribe ye strength unto God: his excellency is over Israel, and his strength is in the clouds.

tokens.t: Ascribe ye strength unto God: his excellency
over Israel, and his strength
in the clouds.

verses.plain: O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.

tokens.t: O God,
terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel
he that giveth strength and power unto
people. Blessed
God.
